item.description:
I had to make a change in location.
The Milford Time was no good for some
of us who were going to the Movie.

I am moving it to the Stratford Movie
Theater on Rt 1 that is across the Street
From the Stratford Home Depot.

I would recommend that we meet
At the McDonalds 20 minutes before the
Movie.
The Movie starts at 7:50 so we should
Meet At McDonalds at 7:30.

The below link gives a visual of where
The Theater is.

http://yellowpages.ao...

yellowpages.aol.com/business/ct/bridgeport/regal-stratford-square-cinema/0-119522280/?query=Movie+Theatres

Let me know if you cannot get into the
Link and you need directions.

It depends on which direction that you are
Coming from the best exit to get off.
I 95 has some weird exits and enterances
Close to the Stratford Theater. I would not
Recommend trying to get off there. I 95 North
Exit 33

Coming from West Haven, I would get off on Rt. 1 in Milford near McDonalds and go over the Milford/Stratford Bridge. I 95 South Exit 34.

Come North, you would be better off getting off
By the Perry House to Main Street (113) to Rt 1.
I 95 Exit 32

The X-Files was a different kind of TV Series.
It dealt with UFOs, other kinds of monsters of the week, Government Conspiracies and horrors of beaucracy.

It was like a Government version of Night Stalker.

There have been many other series since that are in this Genre.

I invite other Meet Up members to come to watch the second X-Files Film.
I Want To Believe.

If you cannot make it to Stratford, then I hope that you can Watch it in a Movie Theater near you.

The movie might be the next screening after 7:00.

If you are going to another Movie Theater, then Please let Us know so that we can make it into a Meet Up for the Team.


A.

http://www.imdb.com/t...

www.imdb.com/title/tt0443701/

http://en.wikipedia.o...

en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_X-Files

item.how_to_find_us: "Meet at McDonalds in Shopping Center 20 minutes before show.
item.name: Coffee Talk Looks Though the Steam of X Files 2 on 8/9
